tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS equipment_maintenance_records (
    equipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule ( 
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    equipment_id INT, 
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50), 
    schedule_date DATE, 
    technician_id INT 
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES EquipmentMaintenanceRecords(equipment_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(100),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  technician_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
  equipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
  purchase_date DATE,
  last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  service_description TEXT,
  technician_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_cost (
  cost_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT NOT NULL,
  labor_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  parts_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
	record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	equipment_id INT,
	maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
	maintenance_description TEXT,
	maintenance_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentAssignments (
	assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	equipment_id INT,
	technician_id INT,
	assignment_date DATE,
	return_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (technician_id) REFERENCES Technicians(technician_id)
);
